metadata.title: Topics in Medicine and Surgery Topics in Medicine and Surgery Equipment for Exotic Mammal and Reptile Diagnostics and Surgery

abstract.original_text: The practice of veterinary medicine is facilitated by appropriate equipment, and exotic pet medicine is no exception. Exotic practitioners use standard or modified veterinary and human equipment, and now even enjoy the benefit of specialized products manufactured specifically for exotic pet practice.

sentences.segment_text: The practice of veterinary medicine is facilitated by appropriate equipment ,
and exotic pet medicine is no exception .
Exotic practitioners use standard or modified veterinary and human equipment ,
and now even enjoy the benefit of specialized products manufactured specifically for exotic pet practice .
